00004     public static void main(String[] args) {
00005         PrintStream out = System.out;
00006 
00007         if(args.length == 0) {
00008             int max = 255;
00009 
00010             int[] topLine = new int[] { 201, 205, 209, 205, 203, 205, 209, 205, 187 };
00011             printCharacters(topLine, out);
00012 
00013             int[] separatorLine =
00014                 new int[] { 199, 196, 197, 196, 215, 196, 197, 196, 182 };
00015             char[] mainLine = { (char)186, '\0', (char)179, '\0',
00016                                 (char)186, '\0', (char)179, '\0', (char)186 }; 
00017             for(int i = 0; i < max / 2; i++) {
00018                 mainLine[1] = mainLine[3] = (char)i;
00019                 mainLine[5] = mainLine[7] = (char)(i + max / 2);
00020                 printCharacters(mainLine, out);
00021                 if(i < max / 2) {
00022                     printCharacters(separatorLine, out);
00023                 }
00024             }
00025             int[] endLine = {200, 205, 207, 205, 202, 205, 207, 205, 188 };
00026             out.print((char)27 + "[2J");
00027             printCharacters(endLine, out);
00028         } else {
00029             for(int i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {
00030                 try {
00031                     int number = Integer.parseInt(args[i]);
00032                     out.println(number + " = '" + (char)number + "'");
00033                 } catch(NumberFormatException nfe) {
00034                     System.err.println("Error: \"" + args[i] + "\" is not a number");
00035                 }
00036             }
00037         }
00038     }

00040     public static void printCharacters(int[] characters, PrintStream out) {
00041         char[] chars = new char[characters.length];
00042         for(int i = 0; i < characters.length; i++) {
00043             chars[i] = (char)characters[i];
00044         }
00045         printCharacters(chars, out);
00046     }
00047 
00048     public static void printCharacters(char[] characters, PrintStream out) {
00049         for(int i = 0; i < characters.length; i++) {
00050             out.print(characters[i]);
00051         }
00052         out.println();
00053     }
00054 }
